select j.id as id,j.title as title,j.goods_name as goodsName,j.classific_id as classificId, d.lable as classificName,s.real_name as contactsName,j.end_date as endDate,j.contacts_phone as contactsPhone, j.ins_ymdhms as insYmdhms,j.status as status,j.collect_flag as collectFlag from j_groupon_demand j,s_sys_data d,s_app_user s, ( SELECT village.village_id FROM s_village village, s_user_area ua WHERE ua.user_id = #{currentUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and village.del_flag = '0' and ua.del_flag = '0'
and ua.area_id = village.province_id
and ua.area_id = village.city_id
and ua.area_id = village.county_id
and ua.area_id = village.community_id
and ua.area_id = village.village_id
) svua where s.id = j.contacts and d.type = #{classificType} and d.value = j.classific_id AND j.village_id IN (svua.village_id)
and j.title like CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{title},'%'))
and d.lable like CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{classificName},'%'))

and DATE_FORMAT(j.end_date, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDateStr}, '%Y-%m-%d')
